text: Flash Forward was the first Disney Channel original TV series. It was produced in Canada by Global Television. The show was meant for pre-teens and teenagers. It was on the Disney Channel from 1995-1997. The show is about two best friends, Tucker and Rebecca, and their neighbors. They are in the eight grade. The show was produced by Atlantic Films. The show had 26 episodes and only one season. == Characters == *Tucker "Tuck" James is played by Ben Foster *Rebecca "Becca" Fisher is played by Jewel Staite *Miles Vaughn is played by Theodore Borders *Christine "Chris" Harrison is played by Asia Vieira *Horace James is played by Ricky Mabe *Ellen Fisher is played by Rachel Blanchard (ep 1-4) and Robin Brûlé == Other websites == * * Category:1995 Canadian television series debuts Category:1997 Canadian television series endings Category:Animated television series Category:Television series by Disney Category:English-language television programs
title: Flash Forward
